    APP_PATH

    This command will automatically be run when you run "rails" with Rails 3 gems installed from the root of your application.

    MORE_ITEMS

    Public Instance Methods

    down() click to toggle source 
    # File db/seeds.rb, line 40
def down
  MORE_ITEMS.each do |item|
    Item.find_by_name(item[:name]).destroy
  end
end
    up() click to toggle source 
    # File db/seeds.rb, line 34
def up
  MORE_ITEMS.each do |item|
    Item.create!(item)
  end
end
    valid_attributes() click to toggle source

    This should return the minimal set of attributes required to create a valid Category. As you add validations to Category, be sure to update the return value of this method accordingly.

    # File spec/controllers/categories_controller_spec.rb, line 26

  {}
end
    valid_session() click to toggle source

    This should return the minimal set of values that should be in the session in order to pass any filters (e.g. authentication) defined in CategoriesController. Be sure to keep this updated too.
